00001 def nsgafronts(pop, rand, size):
00002     newpop = pop[:]
00003     newpop.sort(lambda a,b: cmp(a.rank, b.rank))
00004     subset = newpop[:size]
00005     newindex = []
00006     for ind in subset:
00007         newindex.append(pop.index(ind))
00008     return subset, newindex
